action.action-desc: Mr. Correa (for himself and Mr. Nehls) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on the Judiciary

form.official-title: To authorize the use of certain Department of Justice grants to purchase and operate unmanned aircraft systems to benefit public safety.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Directing Resources for Officers Navigating Emergencies Act of 2025 or the DRONE Act of 2025.

section.header: Use of grant funds for unmanned aircraft

subsection.text: Section 501(a)(1) of the Omnibus Crime Control and Safe Streets Act of 1968 (34 U.S.C. 10152(a)(1)) is amended by adding at the end the following:

subparagraph.text: Programs to purchase and operate unmanned aircraft systems (as such term is defined in section 44801 of title 49, United States Code) to benefit public safety.
